content.query:
DROP EXTERNAL TABLE dbo.Customers;
CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE dbo.Customers (
	[CustomerID] nvarchar(256),
	[LastName] nvarchar(256),
	[FirstName] nvarchar(256),
	[PhoneNumber] nvarchar(256),
	[CreatedDate] date,
	[UpdatedDate] date,
	[DataSourceId] int
	)
	WITH (
	LOCATION = 'Customers',
	DATA_SOURCE = [silver_southridgedatalake02_dfs_core_windows_net],
	FILE_FORMAT = [SynapseDeltaFormat]
	)
GO


SELECT TOP 100 * FROM dbo.Customers
GO
